descriptionHtml:
Behold! King Arthur\'s Sword, Excalibur, is yours for the taking!

This sword can be crafted with 1 Leather Strip, 2 Gold Ingots, and 3 Moonstone Ingots.
Excalibur can be upgraded using 1 Gold Ingot and 1 Moonstone Ingot

This is my first mod so please criticize contructively :)


Possible Future Updates:
May add quest line for obtaining Excalibur, including trials to find the real heir of King Arthur.


If you want to edit this mod and republish, ask me first please!!
author: copyright134
